org.openadaptor.auxil.connector.iostream.writer
Interface IDataWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
LineWriter, StringWriter
public interface IDataWriter

Represent something that writes data to an outputStream. Implementations could be based around strings or specific binary formats.

Author:
perryj

Method Summary

          flushes all data that has been written
 void setOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
          resets the output stream, enabling the implementation to create any writers "around" that outputstream.
